text:
I second the points Jordy pointed out. And I'll add:

If you have those amazing customers already, why not find a way to bring what they say about how your product transformed their lives into the copy? 

That way, when your ICPs who would likely have the same challenges like your existing customers land on this homepage, they'll see (not be told) how Greenfly can transform their lives too.

I tore down some B2B homepage copywriting to further explain what I'm trying to say. Give it a look here:

<https://victoreduoh.com/product-led-saas-homepage-copywriting-examples/|https://victoreduoh.com/product-led-saas-homepage-copywriting-examples/>

attachments.service_name: VEC | Product-led storytelling SaaS content agency
attachments.title: 5 Amazing Product-Led SaaS Homepage Copywriting Examples
attachments.text: “Trouble is, too many companies think they can do their own copywriting despite having no idea where to start (or finish).” And that continued Kristina Adams leads them to: “Bankruptcy.” Whether
